sentences.sContent: You had little cause to judge him so harshly.
sentences.sContent_eng: You had little cause to judge him so harshly.
sentences.sCn: 你没有什么理由这样严厉地批评他。

sentences.sContent: “If we are afraid, if we throw away this opportunity, then history will judge us very harshly,” Mr Papandreou said in a final appeal for support before the vote.
sentences.sContent_eng: “If we are afraid, if we throw away this opportunity, then history will judge us very harshly,” Mr Papandreou said in a final appeal for support before the vote.
sentences.sCn: 帕潘德里欧在投票前最后一次寻求支持的讲话中说：“如果我们害怕，如果我们放弃这次机会，那么历史将会非常严厉地审判我们。”

sentences.sContent: When the U.S. leaves, many Iraqis say, they can deal with the terrorists and their patrons more harshly.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the U.S. leaves, many Iraqis say, they can deal with the terrorists and their patrons more harshly.
sentences.sCn: 许多伊拉克人认为，一旦美国人离开，他们就能更加严厉地对付恐怖分子和他们的支持者。

words.tran: 严厉的；严酷的；刺耳的；粗糙的；刺目的
